cleaned_text: Find the balance your busy life demands with our 300mg Balance Essential Oil in a glass bottle with metal roller ball for daily wellness. An essential oil to center yourself with a blend of plant-based ingredients along with highest quality broad spectrum Hemp. A delightful essential oil blend of Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit peel oil), citrus aurantium artisanal, high quality plant ingredients that are carefully selected and blended by our certified aromatherapist/ Kinesiologist for wellness and well-being. The base is made with Organic Hemp oil, MCT coconut oil, and pure essential oils. Vegan. INGREDIENTS: Hemp Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride (MCT Coconut oil), Citrus Sinensis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit Peel Oil), Vardulcis
